text: Cystanthe monandra is a species of flowering plant. It is known as the common pussypaws.Flora of North America Hershkowitz MA 1990 Nomenclatural changes in Portulacaceae Phytologia 68(4):267-270 The plant is native to the Southwestern United States, Southern California, and nearby Baja California. It grows in sandy areas such as deserts and coastal and mountain scrub habitats. == References == Category:Caryophyllales
title: Cistanthe monandra
